name: Card Crawl Clone
description:
Ask for a toy for your birthday, and dad makes you a hand-made version instead. It's rougher around the edges.. a LOT rougher. But what are you gonna do, complain? It's a gift you ungrateful ankle-biter!

A clone of Card Crawl, as a target to aim for while I learn Unity and whatnot.

Note: My dad didn't make this, I did. Wheeeeee I'm learning Unity!

Also note: I'm not a dad.
